infoArray.name: getDateTimeFormat(format)
infoArray.desc: returns long datetime format for exp. 'DD.MM.YYYY h:mm:ss'. parameter can be L,LL,LLL,LLL,LT,LTS,l,ll,lll,llll. for more info visit momentjs.com

infoArray.name: formatDateTime(date, format)
infoArray.desc: returns string which was formatted. parameter can be L,LL,LLL,LLL,LT,LTS,l,ll,lll,llll. for more info visit momentjs.com

infoArray.name: formatCurrency(currency, format)
infoArray.desc: return string which was formatted. parameter can be D,F,M,FX or money formats(0.0 - 0.0,0 etc.)

infoArray.name: formatMoney(currency)
infoArray.desc: return string money value which was formatted.
